scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:api: cd api && python -m venv .venv && call .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:api: cd api && python -m venv .venv && call .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:api: cd api && if not exist .venv (npm run setup:api) && call .venv\Scripts\activate && pytest
